mapper.insert: insert into user( email, password, user_name, birthday, gender, phone_number, zip_code, basic_address, detail_address, photo, nickname, account, bank ) values( #{email}, password(#{password}), #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{tel}, #{zipCode}, #{basicAddr}, #{detailAddr}, #{photo}, #{nickName}, #{account}, #{bank} )
mapper.select: select user_no, email, password, user_name, birthday, gender, phone_number, zip_code, basic_address, detail_address, photo, nickname, account, bank from user
select user_no, email, password, user_name, birthday, gender, phone_number, zip_code, basic_address, detail_address, photo, nickname, account, bank from user where user_no=#{no}
